name: The Truth (JackDontCare)
description:
The Truth is a story that I developed specifically for Bitsy. It is much more serious than my previous game and this is intentional. I have done my best to utilize this platform to tell a story that means something to me and hopefully it will mean something to you. 

There is no 100% correct interpretation, only your own understanding, but feel free to discuss theories and ideas in the comment section.
